group_1.textRight: The Rumor of the Obsessive Devotress?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's something Karin and Sana @were asking about.

group_1.narration: "Have you heard about it, Iroha? @The Rumor of the Obsessive Devotress... @At Suitoku Temple, a girl appears every day to pray, @her face stricken with desperation..."
"It's a story that's been causing @ripples among the kids of Kamihama City! @How creepy! That's for sure!"

group_1.textRight: That's...just a normal supplicant.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...but what is she praying for?

group_1.textRight: ...Suitoku Temple, is it? It's right nearby.

group_1.textLeft: ...Should we pay a visit? @There's probably nothing to it,
but I do wonder what would make someone @pray so fervently.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, why don't we go check it out?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, there's nothing strange about @this place after all.

group_1.textRight: But we're here anyway, so we ought to pay @our respects.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]Oh, look at that.

group_1.textRight: It seems that we have other worshippers here.

group_1.textCenter: Oi, are you the one who's been stealing @from the money box?!

group_1.textLeft: Our temple's already on the brink @of giving up its land...
I'll be damned if you add insult to injury!

group_1.textCenter: No, seriously, what are you talking about?!

group_1.textLeft: I woulda forgiven you if you'd confessed, @but you've left me with no choice!

group_1.textCenter: This is all a misunderstanding! Let me go...!

group_1.textRight: Um, excuse me, that girl really was just praying!

group_1.narration: "I'm so sorry! @I beg of you, please forgive me!"

group_1.textRight: Look, I'm glad we've cleared things up, @but you really don't have to kneel...
And thanks! You really bailed me out there.

group_1.textLeft: No, it's nothing...
Like I said, our temple's in a seriously @tough spot.
And there's rumors that someone's stealing @our money, so it's put me on edge.
I oughta thank you, too.@[chara:305801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305801:cheek_0][chara:305801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:305801:lipSynch_1]...Shit, I forgot to introduce myself.
Ryoko Natsu's the name!
I'm the protector of Suitoku Temple!
...Well, more seriously, I'm just here to lend @a hand to the priests.
I've kinda gotten a little too fervent about it, @as you can see...

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* And I'm Iroha Tamaki!
And my name is Yachiyo Nanami.

group_1.textLeft: You two from around here?

group_1.textRight: Yes, are you aware of Mikazuki Villa?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, Mikazuki! Nice meetin' ya.
How 'bout you?

group_1.textRight: ...I'm Sakuya Suzuka. Erm, I'm just a regular @high schooler...

group_1.textLeft: You know...

group_1.narration: "You've got the legs of a Kongorikishi Agy≈ç statue!"

group_1.textRight: WHAT?!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, sorry... Temptation got the better @of me for a sec...

group_1.textRight: Is this how all temple workers talk...?

group_1.textLeft: So you're on track and field?

group_1.textRight: ...Well, I was. There was a violent incident @at the club.
We've been suspended and can't participate @in tournaments anymore.
But I wanted to keep myself in shape, so I went @running and found this temple,
and figured I'd ask the gods for their assistance.

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's a Buddhist temple, but the heavens @are watching over us all.
...I had the feeling you weren't the so-called @Obsessive Devotress.

group_1.textRight: Obsessive Devotress?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, that one chick who's been @coming here lately.
Oh hey, speak of the devil.

group_1.textRight: ...That girl...

group_1.textLeft: Doesn't she look upset?
